full_summary:
### Request for Proposal (RFP) - Deployed Logistics Support Services

#### Tender Information
---

* **Title**: Deployed Logistics Support Services
* **Reference Number**: PW_HAL_410_11578
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Solicitation Number**: W3371-225057/B
* **Publication Date**: 2022-09-22
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-11-01T13:00:00

#### Description
---

Department of National Defence is seeking a contractor to provide deployed logistics support services in the Mediterranean/Red Seas, Africa, Middle East, and surrounding areas. The services are required for various naval vessels and support staff assigned to Maritime Forces Atlantic (MARLANT) and, occasionally, Maritime Forces Pacific (MARPAC) when deployed within the described geographical areas.

The objective of this RFP is to acquire a contractor who can provide the required services on an "if and when requested" basis.

#### Key Services
---

* Logistics support services for naval vessels and support staff
* Specialized services for deployed naval vessels and support staff

#### Specifications
---

Please refer to the solicitation document for complete details of the requirement.

#### Inquiries and Contractual Information
---

All inquiries of a technical nature and all questions of a contractual nature must be submitted in writing to the Standing Offer Authority. Please refer to the solicitation document for instructions on how to submit inquiries.

#### Tender Submission
---

Proposals must be submitted only to the Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) Bid Receiving Unit specified below by the date and time indicated on page 1 of the bid solicitation. Please refer to the solicitation document for instructions on how to submit a proposal electronically using CPC Connect.

* Bid Receiving
* Public Works & Government Services Canada
* 1713 Bedford Row
* Halifax, NS B3J 1T3

#### Important Notice
---

This tender is part of Public Services and Procurement Canada’s initiative to submit bid submission files electronically using CPC Connect. Interested bidders should refer to Part 3 of the solicitation document entitled Offer Preparation Instructions for instructions on how to participate and submit their files electronically for this tender.
